alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 22 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Georgia, including the following counties, Brooks, Lanier and Lowndes. * WHEN...Until 630 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 326 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Valdosta, Quitman, Hahira, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Dasher, Morven, I-75 At Exit 22, Kinderlou, Valdosta Regional Airport, Blue Springs, I-75 At Exit 11, Barretts, Brooks Co A/p and Naylor. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
